title: What's Next For The U.S. Patriot Act
teaser: Parts of the Patriot Act expired at midnight, after senators failed to extend it. NPR's Domenico Montanaro explains what happens now.
contentencoded:
The U.S. Senate is back at work today on the Patriot Act. Elements of the surveillance law expired at midnight, after senators failed to extend it.Â NPR’s Domenico Montanaro joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to explain what expired and what happens now.

Guest

  • Domenico Montanaro, lead editor for politics and digital audience at NPR. He tweets @domenicoNPR.
